author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Capinfo Co FY ‍Profit Attributable Up 13 Pct To Rmb81.13 Mln​
text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Capinfo Co Ltd:
* FY ‍PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO OWNERS OF COMPANY INCREASED BY 13.24% TO RMB81.13 MILLION​
* FY ‍OPERATING REVENUE INCREASED BY 6.19% TO RMB1,008.31 MILLION​
* ‍RECOMMENDED PAYMENT OF A FINAL DIVIDEND OF RMB1.25 CENTS PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
